ui.meta_description: Poolside ordering at Itatiaia Resort & Eventos. Scan your table QR and order drinks & snacks to your lounger.
screen.start.title: Start your order
screen.start.subtitle: Scan the table QR with your phone camera app.
screen.start.qr_body: Scan the printed QR at your table. It opens your table page directly.
screen.start.manual_body: If you opened this page manually, enter your table number.
screen.location_missing.title: Location not found
screen.location_missing.subtitle: Please scan the table QR again.
screen.location_confirm.title: Confirm your location
screen.location_confirm.subtitle: Double-check before ordering.
screen.menu.title: Menu
screen.menu.empty: No items available in this category right now.
screen.cart.title: Your cart
screen.cart.subtitle: Review your order before sending.
screen.sent.title: Order sent!
screen.sent.subtitle: Your order has been sent to the waiter.
screen.sent.instructions: The waiter has been notified and will attend to your table shortly.
error.table_not_found: Table number not found. Check and try again.
error.send_failed: Could not send your order. Please try again.
error.modifier_unavailable: This item is temporarily unavailable. Required options for {group} are missing.
order.confirm_line: Please confirm this order at the table.
